thread.title: Mount Etna erupts for first time in eight months - with spectacular show of lava
thread.title_full: Mount Etna erupts for first time in eight months - with spectacular show of lava

author: Associated Press
title: Mount Etna erupts for first time in eight months - with spectacular show of lava
text:
M ount Etna has erupted in a fiery show of lava in eastern Sicily.
The volcano's latest eruptions, which can last days and even weeks, began on Monday evening and are the first for eight months. The giant orange fountains of lava, spewing toward the sky, could be seen in the city of Catania and the resort town of Taormina.
Etna can burst into action several times a year Credit: AP A lthough volcanic ash clouds can cause flight disruptions, the nearby Catania airport was operating normally Tuesday. Authorities reported no danger to the towns that dot the mountain's slopes.
Etna, at 3,330 metres (10,926 feet), is the highest volcano in mainland Europe and can burst into action several times a year. The last major eruption was in 1992.
The eruption was not dangerous and the airport of Catania is still open and fully operating Credit: AP
